component.name: Inochi Creator
component.summary: Tool to create and edit Inochi2D puppets.

description.p: Inochi2D is a framework for realtime 2D puppet animation which can be used for VTubing, game development and digital animation.
Inochi Creator is a tool that lets you create and edit Inochi2D puppets.
